item.title: [FLINK-25941] KafkaSinkITCase.testAbortTransactionsAfterScaleInBeforeFirstCheckpoint fails on AZP
item.description:
The test KafkaSinkITCase.testAbortTransactionsAfterScaleInBeforeFirstCheckpoint fails on AZP with
